member.name: M:Miles33.Precedent.TimeControlsBL.TimeControls.ManipulateFEUser(Miles33.Precedent.TimeRecordingBL.FeeEarnerUsers,Miles33.Precedent.ComboBL.PrecCombo,System.Object)
member.summary: Populate a combobox with the fee earners that the current user has access to.

member.name: M:Miles33.Precedent.TimeControlsBL.TimeControls.LegalAidActivityComboBox(Miles33.Precedent.TimeRecordingBL.TimeClient,System.String@,System.String,Miles33.Precedent.ComboBL.PrecCombo@,System.Object@)
member.summary: Populate a combo box with legal aid structures
member.param: The old legal aid structure code
The current legal aid structure code

member.name: M:Miles33.Precedent.TimeControlsBL.TimeControls.ManipulateActivityTypeComboBox(Miles33.Precedent.TimeRecordingBL.TimeClient@,Miles33.Precedent.TimeRecordingBL.TimeLine@,Miles33.Precedent.ComboBL.PrecCombo@,System.Object@)
member.summary: Populate an activity type combo box based upon a time item
member.remarks: If this is a non-chargeable then populate the combobox with non-chargeable activities. If this is chargeable time line then populate the combobox with the relevant chargeable activities based upon its contentious flag and whether an auditors rule set has been set.

member.name: M:Miles33.Precedent.TimeControlsBL.TimeControls.ManipulateLitigationStageComboBox(Miles33.Precedent.TimeRecordingBL.TimeClient,Miles33.Precedent.TimeRecordingBL.TimeLine,System.Object)
member.summary: Populate a combobox with data based upon the litigation stages for a matter. This data is the stages in progress data
member.returns: a PrecCombo object containing the litigation stages
member.remarks: If the time item has already selected a litigation stage then pre-populate the combo box

member.name: M:Miles33.Precedent.TimeControlsBL.TimeControls.ManipulateLegalAidStructures(Miles33.Precedent.TimeRecordingBL.LegalAidStructures,Miles33.Precedent.ComboBL.PrecCombo,System.Object)
member.summary: Populate a combobox with legal aid structures based upon a legal aid structures object
member.param: The base legal aid structures object

member.name: M:Miles33.Precedent.TimeControlsBL.TimeControls.ManipulateLegalAidExpenseTypes(Miles33.Precedent.TimeRecordingBL.LAExpensePool,Miles33.Precedent.ComboBL.PrecCombo,System.Object)
member.summary: Populate a combobox with expense type data derived from a legal aid charge structure.

member.name: T:Miles33.Precedent.TimeControlsBL.TimeControls
member.summary: An object to faciliate complicated time-related combo boxes
member.remarks: This object is designed to populate combo boxes with complicated data, such as activity type based on chargeable/auditors rule set.
